page.title: 05Housewife
page.content: Most days begin around 7.15a.m.with breakfast,getting the children up,making beds,taking children to school,and doing any shopping like collecting the daily paper.Today is a quick tidy around the house,cup of coffee,a look at the paper and start a day's baking.I usually make a double quantity of everything and put it in the freezer.By the time I have baked, washed up and decorated anything which needs doing it is time for the children to come home from school.So then you fall back into a daily routine:arranging tea,washing up,seeing to pack-ups for the following day and trying to get them to bed.The phone has to be answered.There are errands to be run for husbands or children.A woman's work is never done.
